Description: Unique identifier for the user
Unique username for login and display
User's email address (used for authentication)
User's first name
User's middle name (optional)
User's last name
User's city of residence
User's country of residence
User's contact phone number
User's date of birth
Flag indicating if the user account is soft-deleted
Path to the user's profile picture
Hashed password for authentication
Timestamp of the last successful login
Grants all permissions without explicitly assigning them
Designates whether the user can log into the admin site
Designates whether this user account should be treated as active
Timestamp when the account was created
Link to the core_user table (One-to-One)
List of art forms the user practices (e.g. 'Visual'
Unique identifier for the follow relationship
The user who is following someone
The user being followed
Status of the follow request (pending/accepted)
Timestamp when the follow request was made
Unique identifier for the wallet
The user who owns this wallet
Current balance of Brush Drips (virtual currency)
Timestamp of the last balance update
Unique identifier for the transaction
Amount of Brush Drips transferred
Type of object associated with transaction (e.g. 'post_praise')
ID of the specific object associated with the transaction
Timestamp when the transaction occurred
User who initiated the transaction (sender)
User who received the transaction (recipient)
Unique identifier for the avatar
The user who owns this avatar
Display name for the avatar
Optional description or backstory for the avatar
Current state of the avatar (draft/active/archived)
Indicates if this is the user's currently selected main avatar
Raw JSON data representing the avatar's canvas elements
Path to the final rendered image of the avatar
Path to a smaller thumbnail version of the avatar
Flag indicating if the avatar is soft-deleted
Timestamp when the avatar was created
Timestamp when the avatar was last modified
Unique identifier for the collective
Name of the collective
Detailed description of the collective's purpose
List of rules for members of the collective
Types of art focused on by this collective
Cover image for the collective
Timestamp when the collective was created
Timestamp when the collective was last updated
Unique identifier for the membership record
The collective the user belongs to
The user who is a member
Role of the user within the collective (e.g. 'admin'
Timestamp when the user joined
Timestamp of last membership update
Unique identifier for the channel
Name of the channel
Type of content allowed in the channel
Description of the channel's topic
The collective this channel belongs to
Timestamp when the channel was created
Timestamp when the channel was last updated
Unique identifier for the admin request
The collective where admin status is requested
The user requesting admin privileges
Current status of the request (pending/approved/rejected)
Optional message explaining why they want to be admin
The existing admin who reviewed this request
Timestamp when the request was made
Timestamp when the request was processed
Unique identifier for the post
Main text content or caption of the post
Path to an uploaded image (if applicable)
Path to an uploaded video (if applicable)
Flag indicating if the post is soft-deleted
Type of post (e.g. 'default'
The user who created the post
The channel where this post is published
Timestamp when the post was created
Timestamp when the post was last edited
Unique identifier for the novel chapter
Link to the parent post
Chapter number of the novel entry
Full text content of the novel chapter
Unique identifier for the heart interaction
The post being hearted
The user who hearted the post
Timestamp when the heart was given
Unique identifier for the praise interaction
The post being praised
The user who praised the post
Timestamp when the praise was given
Unique identifier for the trophy type
Name/Identifier of the trophy (e.g. 'golden_brush')
Cost or value of this trophy in Brush Drips
Unique identifier for the trophy award
The post receiving the trophy
The user awarding the trophy
The specific type of trophy awarded
Timestamp when the trophy was awarded
Unique identifier for the critique
The detailed critique text
Flag indicating if the critique is soft-deleted
Overall impression (e.g. 'positive'
The post being critiqued
The user writing the critique
Timestamp when the critique was written
Timestamp when the critique was last edited
Unique identifier for the comment
The comment text
Flag indicating if the comment is soft-deleted
The post being commented on (if applicable)
Flag indicating if this is a reply to a critique
The critique being replied to (if applicable)
The user writing the comment
The parent comment this is replying to (for nested threads)
The gallery being commented on (if applicable)
Timestamp when the comment was written
Timestamp when the comment was last edited
Unique identifier for the gallery
Title of the gallery
Description of the gallery's contents
Current status (draft/published)
Cover image for the gallery
JSON data defining the 3D/2D gallery layout
Width of the gallery canvas
Height of the gallery canvas
Flag indicating if the gallery is soft-deleted
The user who created the gallery
Timestamp when the gallery was created
Timestamp when the gallery was last modified
Unique identifier for the award type
Name of the award
Value of the award in Brush Drips
Unique identifier for the gallery award
The gallery receiving the award
The user giving the award
The specific type of award given
Timestamp when the award was given
Unique identifier for the notification
The content of the notification message
The type of object triggering the notification (e.g. 'post')
The ID of the object triggering the notification
Flag indicating if the user has read the notification
The user receiving the notification
Timestamp when the notification was created
Unique identifier for the notifier record
Link to the parent notification
The user whose action triggered the notification
